meanings.sent1: Tho it rained, we still had fun at the park.
meanings.sent2: I wanted to go for a walk, tho it was getting dark outside.
meanings.sent3: Tho I forgot my umbrella, I danced in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood tall, tho the wind tried to bend it.
meanings.sent5: Even tho the storm was fierce, the ship sailed on.

meanings.sent1: I studied hard, tho the test was difficult.
meanings.sent2: She smiled, even tho she was feeling sad inside.
meanings.sent3: Even tho the cat knocked over the vase, we couldn't help but laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone brightly, even tho the clouds tried to hide it.
meanings.sent5: Even tho the road was long, they kept walking towards their goal.

meanings.sent1: Although it was late, they decided to go for a swim.
meanings.sent2: He wanted to buy the book, although he already had a copy at home.
meanings.sent3: Although the cake looked burnt, it tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: The dog barked loudly, although no one was at the door.
meanings.sent5: Although the mountain was steep, they climbed it with determination.
